name: Nightmares and Other True Stories
description:
Nightmares and Other True Stories

A game made for the Dream Diary Jam 5. Unfortunately, I started work on assets far too late, so this is what I managed to complete.

Made with Godot 3.3.2.

Github repo

Controls

WASD/Arrow keys - Move

Q/E - Rotate camera

J/Z - Interact

Shift - Get debug speed
